Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed won the Player of the Match award after picking up a four-wicket haul.
Taskin Ahmed was on a hat-trick in the first over of his spell.
Taskin dismissed Vikramjit Singh and Bas de Leede off consecutive deliveries.
Hasan Mahmud got the wickets of Tim Pringle and Logan van Beek.
Mustafizur Rahman finished with figures of 4-0-20-3.
Post-Match Reflections: Taskin Ahmed mentioned that hitting the hard lengths on a consistent basis helped the Bangladesh fast bowlers.
Taskin Ahmed stated that length balls, back-of-length balls on a hard length and bouncers were working on the wicket.
Taskin Ahmed tried to be disciplined and not greedy to avoid getting hit for a four.
